item.title: Whats rong
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:132739”]uhhh… wtf?

it declares an odd variable then uses it as a procedure, as well as repeating nothing until something that doesn’t exist…

Download https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/115
Reload Every for firefox. It’s easier than attempting to learn scar just for a clickmouse script.[/quote] thanks ill tell my friend

item.title: Whats rong
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

uhhh… wtf?

it declares an odd variable then uses it as a procedure, as well as repeating nothing until something that doesn’t exist…

Download https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/115
Reload Every for firefox. It’s easier than attempting to learn scar just for a clickmouse script.

item.title: Whats rong
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

whats wrong with this script that my friend gave me can some 1 edit and fix it?//mouse will refresh page repettatively; program refresh; var: getclientdimensions(191,66); procedure begin; GetClientDimensions(191,66); repeat; until(GetTickCount - StartTime > 10000); end.
thanks
